title: ((Harrowing Skin Concept)) Jack-O-Lulu (Fanart bye:Soleka)
body: A couple weeks ago i did a concept of my Jack-O-Lulu harrowing concept, and a fan decided to make a sample of what it would look like, which i love!!!! <3 anyways, Soleka is the artist and he/she gets ALL the credit for this <3

replies.body: O___O  PIX! <3
O.O *blushes* Glad you like it!
Heehee, you got a fan from riot Soleka, we are now a duo of great awsomeness and adorable pix's LOL <3

Now all we need is a Frankenstein {{champion:14}}, a Wolfman {{champion:19}}, a Risen Mummy {{champion:32}}, a Jack the Pumpkinhead {{champion:9}}, a Ghost {{champion:56}}, a vampire {{champion:8}}, and a demon {{champion:17}} and this will be the Harroween of all Runeterra.
At least three of those exist xD

I know that the pumpkin head fiddle exists but the rest... i mean, amumu can just be himself and warwick too but sion, vladimir, and nocturne can be given these skins due to the resemblances. Everyone knows Teemo deserves his skin.
Vlad and Nocturne have those skins already is what he meant.
Yep, you are right. I love Nocturne's skin too. lol. But Vlad's Count Vladimir needs a possible Splash Update or VU. Or he can use his Nosferatu skin.
his Nosferatu skin was his harrowing skin.
is it wrong of me to want a Frankenfurter {{champion:8}} ?

> is it wrong of me to want a Frankenfurter {{champion:8}} ?

OMG That would be awesome!!!

> and a demon {{champion:17}}.

I thought it was the classic skin?

Their should defiantly be a Grimm Reaper Teemo that places little Skull Mushrooms and looks very sinister :3

There can never be enough Teemo skins :D
{{champion:45}} Want!!
:D  I think the pumpkin hat really makes the picture!
I NEEEEED IT!
Great job on Post of the Day! is a great idea.

@.@ h...holy.... 

well I wasn't expecting this....

Thank you!
T-this is post of the day!? WOW! Im honored, and i would say the same for Soleka! ;-; Thx
It was a really cool idea. It really meshed nicely with Lulu, Whom I think is very balanced between whimsy and creepy.
YESH! <3
PLEASE. RIOT. RIOT. THIS NEEDS TO EXIST.

+1 for Pix.

Nice head he's gotten. I want one too!
Yes plz, +1.
If not this year I could see this happening for next year (^_^) just keep your fingers crossed
I WOULD CRY TEARS OF LOVE AND JOY AND I WOULD BE SO HAPPY I WOULD LITERALLY THE SECOND I LOGIN TO MY ACCOUNT WOULD BE IN CHALLENGER FROM PLAYING THAT SKIN SO MUCH!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aTw6297Dlmc
u see the start of the post says PotD? that's means post of the day.
No man, she needs to turn her enemies into jack o lanterns.
she does... i said that in my other post...

> she does... i said that in my other post...

Accept my bump and like it! :P +1 for literacy, eh?
ADORABLE <3
that pumpkin hat is actually great idea
